text: 14.155 Part 1(a) refers to strategic views identified in the latest versions of the London View Management Framework and Tower of London and Maritime Greenwich World Heritage Site Management Plans which have impacts on developments within Tower Hamlets. 14.156 Part 1(b) refers to the group of tall buildings around Canary Wharf that form a distinctive cluster, referred to as the â€˜skyline of strategic PEOPLE, PLACES AND SPACES
